twitch_info.title: Highlight: 217+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: hello algo bbfHey
lorema2ShimmyO hello xoryla
I'm going to be practicing the last 3 attacks today
another 2 hours of grind today!!
consistency is key
is a key to clearing the game in a week
yeah, I'm trying to limit the amount of time the attempts will take
that said, I will be taking a break from stream next week
so that means no practicing the avoidance for a week?
or youll be doing it off stream
off stream
the only time I take a break from this game is if my hands need rest
im imagining how will you feel yourself after clearing the original game
like  220 hours of practicing
probably, "I'm glad it's over, I spent a lot of time on this game"
you get used to long grinds when it's all you do
or "OMG YESSSS FINALLY IVE BEATEN THIS SHITTY GAME"
I don't think it's shitty right now, but maybe my opinion will change after dying to final a few times LUL
i assume the reaction will be similar to your fish clear
you spent there a lot of time as well
yes, for fish, I was just pleasantly surprised it happened so quickly, and eager to move on to destruction state
generally I think the practice makes the victory more expected
yeah, your tactic is to get 100% consistency of every single one of attacks of the avoidance by practicing for 250 hrs
and then clear the original in a day
LUL, there's no way
I think it will take at least a month of attempts
well, it's so random, maybe I could get lucky
and do it in a week like you say
thats a reasonable tactic  but a long time spending
I'm thinking long-term
it's okay to spend a lot of time on a game if its one that you started playing when it was really hard for you
that's my thought on it
fish was just as much a struggle as this was when I started it
surely its ok
and if you still enjoy grinding it then its really good
yeah, I'm very careful in choosing a game to play, since I know how long I will spend on it
i suppose if the game had more patterns you wouldn't start playing it
yes
i remember you said something like you hate pattern things
that's why I did not pick mayumushi
yeah
I hate grinding pattern avoidance but I think they make for cool clear videos
melanzana moment
things like SciuruS seem very cool to me
sciurus is something new here?
yeah, melanzana would take me forever without a practice tool, and even with one...
I will post a vid
ive seen only 1 recent clear
of sciurus
oh, you've seen it
yes, it's a new game
i am checking hof
from time to time
and then i saw like wow new top 10 game with one clear by dlfma
yeah, I'm most interested in the stop near the top generally
since that's the hardest stuff
and I'm attracted to difficulty
same
but since sciurus is easier than DS I will not be playing it probably
ive cleared only k2 k3 and destruction state
that's all my clears
yeah, seems like we're similar in that respect
although I never played k2 and quit k3 at shine and bright LUL
so i guess you only beat fish?
in terms of full games, fish is the only notable clear
the next hardest game I beat after that was boric acid LUL
and after that, rori girl
oh i do not know both of these games
boric acid is like 30 difficulty, rori girl is like 10
lol
"the next hardest game" based
now to be clear, I played a lot of other avoidance, but did not get close to clearing any of them
i am glad you like playing the same avoidance i like
many people don't usually want to play ds
for some reason
yes, it's fun to see someone else with the same taste, especially such a niche game like DS
or am i wrong
I think ds is just to hard for most people, they are intimidated
I think you are right
i fell in love into this avoidance mostly because of the music
and imagine if a normal person, not a fangame player, tried to play destruction state. imagine what they would think about the game
the music is definitely one of the most important things in an avoidance
like  i found out about this game not knowing anything within fangame community or smth
yes, you are an exception
what kind of games did you play before kamilia and destruction state?
boshy
before boshy - super meat boy
on keyboard ?
before all of it - undertale
on keyboard yeah
sounds like a lot of good indie games
also i liked the type of games like Detroit become human
heavy rain
and racing games were also an object of interest
any particular racing games?
I used to play mario kart LUL
and split second, that was fun
hahah  i meant need for speed or forza
split second is super fun
yeah, those are more serious racing games
I was definitely always a more casual player, who just like blowing stuff up in split second
explosion game with cars
what can be better
bullet hell Kappa
and now i downgraded myself into playing avoidances BloodTrail
haha u died lorema2SMOREc
hi nojah, welcome
hello
sup Algo, hi Xoryla
one of the things I like about bullet hell is that it makes bullet hell in mainstream games very easy
I had a very easy time with the rng segments in battletoads, for instancve
yeah right
nobody's ever beaten Battletoads
and if I went back to hollow knight, I think it would help there too
joke's over, stop lying about it
i just found out in myself that i super like dodging virtual objects
yeah, well if I had beat battletoads, it would make it easier Kappa @LoremasterNojah
when i played undertale
yeah, dodging bullets is just so fun
I'm going to the store, you guys want anything?
did you do all the endings for undertale? @xoryla
@LoremasterNojah A gigantic box of cereal
some energetic drinks, they help concentrate in dodging bullets B)
yes i did all the endings
and also did all bosses no hit
that experience must have helped a lot for avoidance
yeah i was on the roll when i found out i enjoy dodging
up to that i did no hit omega flowey
in a week or so
mastermaxifiy did that too right?
that's the hardest and the most lick based one to do without damage
yep maxify did it as well
luck based*
lick based lol
when I chatted about it with max he said this:

its very very skill based almost no luck whatsoever involved theres one thing flowey can do which is basically gg and its if he uses bombs and then follows with shurikens 2 you basically have to dodge waves of bullets while at the top of the screen and its pretty much impossible to react to that situation isnt too common though

main difficulty from flowey comes from phase 7 which is the entire section where you attack him attacks come out faster so they start crossing over phases 1-6 which are all the short parts with the intermissions is pretty much like 100% consistent if you know what you are doing
so that being what he said, I don't know how that agrees with your experience of the boss
that was my first experience in dodging bullets
so i might being wrong about luck dependence
yeah, the better you get, the less luck there is
the bombs + shurikens thing is a real problem yeah
but its possible to survive it without damage
yeah, I guess it's just more luck-based than the rest
I can't remember, is omega flowey a mod?
i could react to shurikens appearing just because it goes with a certain animation of omega flowey sprite
omega flowey is a neutral route final boss
I see
I'm not even sure whether I beat undertale
it does a very confusing thing when you fight flowey
with your save data
and I couldn't tell whether the game was over
when a tiny flower became a killing machine by absorbing  6 human souls
is there a regular flowey fight, or is omega flowey the only flowey?
omega flowey is the only one flowey boss if you not consider true pacifist final boss
okay, in that case, I fought flowey too
not nohit, of course Kappa
final attacks here are so epic  with the music
the back and forth curving attack is impossible to read though
I can do some 1.0 practice then
the back and forth curving?
oohh i got it
didn't know this back and forth phrase

pretty accurate when theres destruction state happening
it's a coincidence though
you did the avoidance!!!!!!
clear screen is just an upskirt picture LUL
gg
yeah, gg
clear
insane clear
youre insane?????
don't know why your koishi has tentacles though
there is an octopus or something inside her raincoat
I think
well, it has 9 arms instead of 8, but close enough
back
I thought that the tentacles were an amusing way of solving the problem in character-based input viewers, where there is no way to show the character pressing more than two buttons at once
and no, she has a symbiotic organism that is attached to her
nojah, is this real lore?
yes
you can tell I'm not into this kind of thing
she is a Satori Youkai
I'm just appropriating touhou culture
playing a game with sprites ripped from touhou
you need to learn the background of the waifus or you'll never get good at these games
you'll never understand the true essence of Danmaku
you must meditate in a rock garden
I guess I will forever suck then LUL
you don't know who the fish character is though right?
who is @anotherttvviewer and why he has 106k followers lol
probably some bot, idk
your viewer
its time to shower yourself sure
yes, I really need a shower
many of them
youre too good in falling burst
damn
honestly, falling burst is pretty simple most of the time
it took me 10 attempts to just nearly understand it
yeah, I just have the benefit of more practice
always was getting too excited and nervous when it comes up
oh yes, nerves are the other thing
there are no nerves in a practice situation
and also it was a shame when i was dying to the second cycle
but in a real attempt, they always play a big role
I think second cycle is just as hard as the first
as it is easier than the first one
i guess
you have to do different things, but for me, they are similar difficulty
it's easier to read and dodge vertically directed bunch of bullets
for me at least
when the first cycle happens you need to dodge the wave of diagonally directed bullets
that go from the top centre
I agree, but one of the second bursts is also very close to you. And sometimes, you need to dodge the bullets from the rightmost burst as well
yeah rightmost burst on the second cycle is a reason why i felt sad after dying to the second cycle
rng moment
truly
for me
yeah, it is still possible to read it. zero does in his clear
just realized that ive played bursts only ~20 times  so id better listen to your words about the attack
well, that may be true, but you are also better than me, so you have to factor that in as well
it is a funny feeling though ,to have beaten bursts more times than anyone else in the world LUL
haha true
a guru of this avoidance
(youll become a true guru when you clear it tho)
Dr. DESTRUCTION
that's me
but yes, not until I clear
now that I have audio, I can practice the fall
you have a sound delay here?
a little
I did my best to sync it up with the actual avoidance but It's not perfect
so that made me convince it is hard to make a practice tool
I noticed that the fall is not quite correctly synced, but I could not figure out whether it was too early or too late
it took a few days work yeah
it only gets hard if there are some long-term dependencies in the code outside of the timeline
convince is a wrong word
make sure
yes, that's right
you could also say something like "that convinced me that it is hard to make a practice tool"
truuuuue
yeah, the music sync is noticably off
I should fix that
it's too delayed compared to the avoidance, you say?
it happens only in the fall warp i think
each warp has a separate sound file
not too much but it's noticeable
so I can just get a sound file that starts slightly earlier in the song for the fall warp
I will probably do that after the stream
in the meantime, since I don't want to practice with incorrect audio cues, I will go back to the last three attacks
if i didn't say anything you wouldn't notice it
well, the thing is I personally noticed it while playing the original
when the sound is too late, you die to the platforms disappearing before you expect them too

July 29

just because i was spending not so much time on it

iw maker along with ds

so true though
